nodes.text: Scimitar Squad was a squadron of TIE/sa bombers that made up part of the Imperial Navy's Starfighter Corps during the Galactic Civil War between the Galactic Empire and the Alliance to Restore the Republic.The starfighter pilots Captain Jonus and Major Rhymer were part of the squadron and where on board the Death Star II in the Endor system during the Battle of Endor in 4 ABY.
